name: Anonymouskechard's Sandbox Game
description:
This is my first game. Criticism is encouraged.

Controls:

W, A, S, D: Move

 Tab: Open inventory

 Left Click: Place, Add restraint, use tool

 Right Click: Break, Remove Constraint, stop interacting 

 Middle Mouse: Interact, drag (Glue mode)

 Escape: Pause

 Arrows: Rotate, resize (In the respective mode) 

 F11: Fullscreen 

 F12: Screenshot 

 Ctrl: Snap rotation

Note: If you use anything from the game, give credit
